Body:
df = op.spark.createDataFrame([(0, 'a'), (1, 'b'), (2, 'c'), (3, 'a'), (4,
    'a'), (5, 'c')], ['id', 'category'])
df_indexed = fe.string_to_index(df, 'category', stringOrderType='frequencyAsc')
assert_spark_df(df_indexed)
expected_collect = op.sc.parallelize([Row(id=0, category='a',
    category_index=2.0), Row(id=1, category='b', category_index=0.0), Row(
    id=2, category='c', category_index=1.0), Row(id=3, category='a',
    category_index=2.0), Row(id=4, category='a', category_index=2.0), Row(
    id=5, category='c', category_index=1.0)]).toDF()
assert_equal(df_indexed.select('category', 'category***STRING_TO_INDEX',
    'id').collect(), expected_collect.collect())
